projects.title: Autonomous Omni-Wheel Library Robot (Capstone)
items: Integrated Jetson Nano with Arduino motor control and AI navigation.
Implemented ROS-based LiDAR mapping and IR-guided line following.

projects.title: Smart Home Automation (Samsung PRISM Worklet)
items: Built 3D smart home simulation in Unity as a testbed for AI agents.
Connected AI backend with real-time device orchestration via WebSocket/HTTP.
Developed control dashboard for monitoring and agent-based interaction.
